name: Ninja Cut 2D
description:
You've come to the right place, because a simple, exciting and addictive arcade game with puzzle elements awaits you.
Turn into a legendary shadow warrior! Become a Ninja!
In our game you will be able to choose between close combat with a sword, and ranged attack where you use kunai or bombs.
Ninja is able to jump wherever you want! Thanks to this, you will surprise unsuspecting opponents with a stealthy attack from all sides.
However, you need to be careful and think carefully about your moves, because there are traps waiting for you, which you have to avoid, but with a bit of cunning and strategic thinking, you can use them and use them to neutralize the enemy.
Our arcade game has 3 modes:
- standard mode - you jump on walls and attack enemies with your sword
- kunai mode - you throw a Japanese knife at anything you want
- bomb mode - you throw explosive surprises at your unaware enemies
Hundreds of unique levels, original combat mechanics, great physics and great audiovisual settings await you.
What are you waiting for? In a few moments you can become a mythical warrior and go down in history!
